meanings.sent1: The cravers lined up outside the bakery, eager for fresh pastries.
meanings.sent2: She is a cravers of adventure, always seeking new experiences.
meanings.sent3: The cravers at the ice cream shop couldn't decide which flavor to choose.
meanings.sent4: His friends jokingly called him a cravers of all things spicy.
meanings.sent5: The image of the cravers devouring the buffet lingered in her mind.

meanings.definition: To have a strong desire for something.
meanings.sent1: After a long day at work, she cravers a hot cup of tea.
meanings.sent2: He cravers success and is willing to work hard for it.
meanings.sent3: The cat cravers attention and will meow until someone pets her.
meanings.sent4: The plant cravers sunlight to grow and thrive.
meanings.sent5: As the storm approached, the ship cravers safe harbor.
